modName: New male texture for SOS - Sundracon - FS body
summary: Now compatible with SOS - Schlongs of Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
[b][u][size=4]SAM is out!
I'm in another project about SAM. I edit this mod when it's out!
Thanks for everyone who have used/or use the actual texture of my mod.
Keep smiling![/size][/u][/b]

Changelog :

0.7- new belly button.
0.8a- resize specular map to 8ko at 64ko (thanks to sh1ny)
0.8b- resize specular map to 64Ko at 16ko (64ko is too big, make crash during loading)
0.9- Release on Nexus. New texture merged with favoredsoul body. (wip)
0.9a- Sundracon version
0.9b- Erect favoredsoul body compatible texture
0.9c- New texture for favoredsoul with "trust" tattoo and a more muscled look.
1.0 - Compatible with SOS.
1.0 - (21/06/2013) - hairy texture comptible with SOS.
2.0 - Much better normal map. Hairy chest texture.
2.0 - (24/06/2013) Chest hairy texture without trust tattoo added.
24/12/2013 : optional file with defined abs.


Don't use my texture without my permission. PM me if you want use for your mod!

Thanks to Smurf & VectorPlexus for Schlongs of Skyrim, download and endorse it here : http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35463/?
author: Alex778
